methods.name: ResetSystemWallpaper
methods.description: Remove currently set system home screen wallpaper, reverting to the system's built-in wallpaper.

methods.name: ResetLockScreenWallpaper
methods.description: Remove currently set system lock screen wallpaper, reverting to the system's built-in wallpaper.

methods.name: SetWallpaperHome
methods.description: Use 'WallpaperError' event for error.

methods.name: SetWallpaperLockScreen
methods.description: Minimum api level should be 25. For error use 'WallpaperError' event.

methods.name: GetHomeScreenWallpaper
methods.description: Retrieve the current system wallpaper, if no wallpaper is set, the system built-in static wallpaper is returned. For error use 'WallpaperError' event.

methods.name: GetLockScreenWallpaper
methods.description: Retrieve the current lock screen wallpaper, if no wallpaper is set, the system built-in static wallpaper is returned. For error use 'WallpaperError' event.

methods.name: GetStatusBarHeight
methods.description: Get status bar height.

methods.name: GetNavigationBarHeight
methods.description: Get navigation bar height.

methods.name: SetFullScreen
methods.description: Set fully transparent status bar and navigation bar. Required api level should be greater than or equal to KITKAT.

methods.name: DisplayRefreshRate
methods.description: Get the refresh rate of display in frame per second.

methods.name: OrientationOfDisplay
methods.description: # Portrait -> 1,  # Landscape -> 2,  # Undefined -> 0

methods.name: IsBrightnessAutoMode
methods.description: Get boolean for automatic brightness mode is active or not.

methods.name: ChangeBrightnessMode
methods.description: Change brightness mode like automatic to manual.

methods.name: GetStatusDarkerColor
methods.description: Returns the darker color of the given color for the status bar.

methods.name: IsColorDark
methods.description: Returns true if it is a dark color.

methods.name: AnimateColor
methods.description: Animate the background color of a view.

methods.name: AnimateStatusBarColor
methods.description: Animate the NavigationBar Color.

methods.name: AnimateNavigationBarColor
methods.description: Animate the StatusBar Color.

methods.name: CalculateColor1
methods.description: This is a simple color tool block. Change color to light and dark color by alpha

methods.name: CalculateColor2
methods.description: Color tool for transparent color.

methods.name: GetDominantColor1
methods.description: Returns the dominant color of the given image. Returns 0 if there is an error or problem.

methods.name: GetDominantColor2
methods.description: Returns the almost second dominant color of the given image. Returns 0 if there is an error or problem.

name: Minitools
helpString:
Smart MiniTools

Created using powerful rush.

Documentation of extension is here.

My Youtube Channel

Sonraj Tech

events.name: GotWallpaper
events.description: Retrieve the current system wallpaper; if no wallpaper is set, the system built-in static wallpaper is returned.

events.name: WallpaperError
events.description: Event for any error occurred in wallpaper activity. Like get wallpaper and set wallpaper.
